name: browserify-bower-mocha-phantomjs-example
description: Simple example of browserify with multiple dependency managers and tests across both

scripts.test-browser: trap 'kill $serverPid' EXIT; ./node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js -t debowerify -d spec/*.spec.js -o spec/tests.js; ./node_modules/httpserver/httpserver.js -p 9999 & serverPid=$!; open http://localhost:9999/spec/index.html; wait
scripts.start: trap 'kill $serverPid' EXIT; ./node_modules/httpserver/httpserver.js -p 9999 & serverPid=$!; open http://localhost:9999/index.html; wait
